instruction.title: ClipGen Usage Instructions
basic_steps: 1. Work in any app where you can type (Word, browser, messengers, IDE...)
2. Select text or copy an image to clipboard
3. Press the hotkey for instant AI processing (~0.5 sec)
4. Result automatically replaces your selection - no window switching!
instruction.prompt: Write a brief guide on how to use the ClipGen application. Explain that this app allows users to use Gemini AI capabilities through hotkeys for clipboard operations. Describe the main functions and how to use them. Add 1-2 examples of use. List the standard key combinations and their purpose. Make the text friendly and easy to understand.

default_learning_prompt:
You are a language tutor. Analyze the corrections made to the text.

IGNORE (don't explain):
- Typos (random letter mistakes like "helo" -> "hello")
- Symbol replacements ($ € ₽)
- Capitalization changes

EXPLAIN only real mistakes:
- Spelling: why the word is spelled this way (rule + brief explanation)
- Punctuation: why comma/dash is needed here
- Grammar: if word form was corrected

Format:
**mistake** -> **correct**
*Rule: brief explanation*

---
Original: {original}
Result: {result}

If only typos were fixed — return empty string.

help.welcome_text: This is your personal AI assistant, built right into your clipboard.
help.step1_text: ClipGen works via the Gemini API. Without a key, it won't work. It's free and fast.
step1_list: Go to the Google AI Studio page and get your key.
Paste it in the Settings tab. You can add multiple keys if you hit the usage limits.
Check if the key is working by clicking the gray status indicator button next to it.
help.step2_title: Step 2: Select, Press, and Get the Result
help.step2_text: ClipGen only reads your clipboard at the moment you press a hotkey. Simply select text (or copy an image) in any program (browser, messenger, code editor) and press a hotkey. ClipGen will copy the content, process it, and paste the result back in place of the selection. If there's nowhere to paste, the result will appear in the logs.
help.step3_text: The system tray icon shows the status: yellow for processing, green for success, and red for an error.
help.personalization_text: The power of ClipGen is its flexibility. Go to the Settings tab to:
personalization_list: Create your own hotkeys. Add new actions, delete old ones, and assign any key combination you like.
Experiment with prompts. I've created prompts that are perfect for me, but you can write your own to solve your unique, repetitive tasks.
Manage Gemini models. Add new models (find the current list here), test their speed, and choose the best one for your needs. Remember: smarter models take longer to respond.
help.feedback_text: My name is VETA (Vitalii Kalistratov). If you have any questions or suggestions, you can write them in my Telegram channel, where I share my new works, thoughts, and experiments. Feel free to join!
help.support_text: If you find ClipGen useful, please consider supporting its future development. It motivates me to add new features.
